items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Utility Bill from London City Utilities is available and valid until 2023-12-31.
Data for the years 2020, 2021, and 2022 is available with Ellipro scores and financial metrics.
Bank account and SWIFT code information are available and verified.
Headquarters address matches the legal entity data (25 Bank Street, Canary Wharf, London, E14 5JP, GB).
Jurisdiction is confirmed as Great Britain (GB).
Some regulatory compliance statuses are under review (e.g., Industry License, Environmental Compliance).
Business scope verification status is pending.
Confirmed matches with PEPs require investigation and additional documentation.
The reported net revenue for 2023 is $158.1 billion, reflecting strong performance across its business lines.
Market capitalization for 2023 is $489,320 million as per the Annual Report.
